definition.name: Azure Container Registry Build
definition.description: Use ACR to build a container image
definition.author: Alessandro Vozza

inputs.name: service_principal
inputs.description: Service Principal with Contributor role on the ACR

inputs.name: registry
inputs.description: The name of the ACR, minus the .azurecr.io

inputs.name: git_access_token
inputs.description: Github access token for private repositories

inputs.name: tag
inputs.description: Docker image tag, default to the commit SHA

inputs.name: branch
inputs.description: Branch to build from, defaults to master

inputs.name: folder
inputs.description: The folder in the Github repo that holds the source

inputs.name: dockerfile
inputs.description: The location of the Dockerfile; defaults to ./Dockerfile

inputs.name: build_args
inputs.description: JSON specifying key=value pairs as as Docker build arguments
